sentences.sContent: Louisa seems to have much more poise and confidence.
sentences.sCn: 路易莎似乎更加沉着自信了。

words.tran: 泰然自若的，镇定的；平衡的，均衡的；摆好姿势不动的，静止的

trans.tranOther: to put or hold something in a carefully balanced position, especially above something else
a calm confident way of behaving, combined with an ability to control your feelings or reactions in difficult situations
